title: ICICI Bank Q4 results and dividend announcement 2025
summary: ICICI Bank announces Q4 2025 results with an 18% year-over-year profit increase. The private lender also declared its highest dividend in the last 10 years, marking significant growth in key metrics including NII and deposits.
content:
ICICI Bank has released its fourth quarter results for the financial year 2025, showcasing strong performance with an 18% year-over-year increase in profit. The private sector lender demonstrated robust growth across key parameters including Net Interest Income (NII) and deposit base.

The bank has also announced its dividend for 2025, which stands as the highest cash reward to shareholders in the past decade, highlighting the bank's strong financial position and commitment to shareholder value.

The announcement comes amid positive market sentiment, with the broader market indices showing upward momentum. The results and dividend declaration are expected to influence market dynamics in the banking sector.

source.title: ICICI Bank Q4 results, dividend 2025 announcement date and time, expectations, preview, estimates

markdown_content:
## Financial Results Highlights
ICICI Bank has released its fourth quarter results for the financial year 2025, showcasing strong performance with an 18% year-over-year increase in profit. The private sector lender demonstrated robust growth across key parameters including Net Interest Income (NII) and deposit base.

## Shareholder Returns
The bank has also announced its dividend for 2025, which stands as the highest cash reward to shareholders in the past decade, highlighting the bank's strong financial position and commitment to shareholder value.

## Market Impact
The announcement comes amid positive market sentiment, with the broader market indices showing upward momentum. The results and dividend declaration are expected to influence market dynamics in the banking sector.
